name: Juicebox
headline: AI-powered talent sourcing for recruiters
description:
In the past decade, the recruiting industry has not had any innovation. AI has created an opportunity to disrupt it through software that can reason and take actions.

Juicebox is an AI-powered recruiting platform. We build agentic workflows to identify, assess, and engage the best talent.

We’ve grown to 7 figures in revenue with 20% monthly growth. We have 500+ customers including Patreon, Replit, and leading AI labs.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:generative-ai; industry:b2b; industry:recruiting; industry:hr-tech; location:san-francisco-bay-area
generated_description:
Juicebox is a forward-thinking startup located in San Francisco, launched in 2022 as part of Y Combinator's Batch S22. Its mission is simple yet impactful: to redefine the recruiting landscape through AI-powered talent sourcing. Over the past decade, the recruiting industry has languished without significant innovation. Juicebox aims to disrupt this space by utilizing software that can thoughtfully identify, assess, and engage top talent.

The company has quickly made a name for itself, boasting over 500 customers, including high-profile names like Patreon and Replit, and achieving a healthy 20% monthly growth — reaching seven figures in revenue. This growth underscores a clear demand for more efficient and effective recruitment solutions.

Juicebox's flagship product, PeopleGPT, is an AI search engine designed specifically for recruiting. It allows recruiters to conduct talent searches using natural language, eliminating the need for complex Boolean queries. This feature enables users to find qualified candidates by simply describing what they’re looking for — a sleek and intuitive approach to recruitment.

With a small but dynamic team of seven, Juicebox is consistently enhancing its offerings. Their product suite includes advanced tools like Talent Insights, which provides analytics on candidate pools, and Email Outreach features that optimize communication while preserving the user's unique tone.

The platform is distinctively cognitive, analyzing data from a vast array of professional profiles, technical websites, and published research, all in real-time. It aims to help organizations fulfill their recruitment needs by accessing an expansive database that includes approximately 800 million profiles globally.

Juicebox is more than just a recruitment tool; it's a clear demonstration of how AI can drive positive change in traditionally inert industries. With backing from leading venture capital firms and impressive traction in the market, it stands poised to redefine what talent sourcing looks like.

You can check them out at [Juicebox.ai](https://juicebox.ai/).
